docs.text: M42PL - A Data Processing Language M42PL is a data processing language , inspired by Unix shells and Splunk . The language is designed to be as easy as possible to use, and to make common scripting and programming tasks even easier. It does not have a tedious syntax to learn, and hides advanced programming concepts from the user.
docs.title: Home
